name: spin-sqlite-web-cli
description: A spin app to explore the the sqlite DB

scripts.build: npx inline-script-tags assets/sqlite-cli.html assets/index.html && npx inline-stylesheets assets/index.html assets/index.html && npx webpack --mode=production && mkdir -p target && spin js2wasm -o target/spin-sqlite-web-cli.wasm dist/spin.js
